title: List sorting.
body:
Edited -Im not sure if its just my browser and security but when I enter say GD I get a **Sort by: Recent** at the top but there is no way to change how it is sorted.-
The relevant part pertains to search results. 
When I search I get a list of results that does not seem to be ordered by popularity, most recent, most comments or anything really. 
Is there a way to fix this? Do other people have a selection of listing options like most recent comment, date of OP, popularity? 
If not can Riot maybe fix their boards to make it easier to find the most relevant searched thread?
Please answer question for searched threads.
